:• '''1733''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''800''' Mbps - 4SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''2600 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Connect Home Pro AC2600 Smart Wi-Fi System}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.samsung.com/us/smart-home/smartthings/hubs/samsung-connect-home-smart-wi-fi-system---pro-et-wv530bwegus/}} {{SupportPage|http://www.samsung.com/us/support/owners/product/connect-home-pro-single}} Sold as a single device labeled as a ET-WV530'''B'''. :FCC photos appear to show 1 GiB of RAM. Some reviews online say that the device contains :512MiB of RAM and 4GiB of flash. {{WiFiCert|WFA67789|12/14/2016}} ===Teardown=== *[https://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/Samsung+Connect+Home+Teardown/104807 ''Samsung Connect Home'' Teardown on '''iFixit'''] ===See also=== :[[List of Wireless Systems]] *[[Samsung ET-WV520]] - ''Connect Home Smart Wi-Fi System'' *[[Samsung ET-WV525]] - ''SmartTings WiFi Hub'' *[[Samsung ET-WV530]] - ''Connect Home Pro Smart Wi-Fi System'' *[[Samsung ET-WV535]] - ''SmartTings WiFi Pro Hub'' __NOTOC__
